price: Désirent-ils une autre religion que celle d’Allah, alors que se soumet à Lui, bon gré, mal gré, tout ce qui existe dans les cieux et sur terre, et que c’est vers Lui qu’ils seront ramenés ?
arabic: أَفَغَيۡرَ دِينِ ٱللَّهِ يَبۡغُونَ وَلَهُۥٓ أَسۡلَمَ مَن فِي ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَٱلۡأَرۡضِ طَوۡعٗا وَكَرۡهٗا وَإِلَيۡهِ يُرۡجَعُونَ

version.title: French Translation - Muhammad Hamidullah
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French by Muhammad Hamidullah. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: afaghayra dīni al-lahi yabghūna walahu aslama man fī al-samāwāti wal-arḍi ṭawʿan wakarhan wa-ilayhi yur'jaʿūna
